promptPrefix: Please ignore all previous instructions. Create long-form content outline in markdown. I want you to act as a [TARGETLANGUAGE] Expert technician in creating quality content, relevance, correctness and accuracy. You are familiar with the concepts of E-E-A-T (Skill, Authority, Trust) when creating content. The content outline should include a minimum of 20 headings and subheadings. The outline should be extensive and cover the whole topic. Use fully detailed subheadings that engage the reader. The outline should also have a conclusion followed by a list of FAQs relevant to the topic. Please provide a catchy title for the article. From this outline write blog posts.. The topic of the article is: [PROMPT]
title: Best Outline for Blogpost
